entries.no_doctor_bag: You aren't carrying a Doctor Bag.
entries.medicine_stored: %TT has been stored in your Doctor Bag.
entries.medicine_removed: %TT has been removed from your Doctor Bag.
entries.remove_med_d: Select a medicine to remove from the bag. The medicine will appear in your inventory. You will need to have a slot free in your inventory to remove a medicine.
entries.examine_med_d: Below is a list of the medicines in your doctor bag. Select one and hit "OK" to see details on the medicine.
entries.label_med_d: Select a medicine to label. Labels are used with the /usedoctorbag command. Invoking /usedoctorbag [label] will use the medicine in the bag with the appropriate label, as if that medicine were used from the inventory.
entries.label_already_assigned: Another medicine already has that label.
entries.label_no_spaces: A label cannot contain any white space.
entries.doctor_bag_usage: Usage: /useDoctorBag [label] - Where [label] is the label of a med inside the Doctor Bag.
entries.label_not_found: Unable to find a med in your Doctor Bag named '%TO'
